publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3605 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Designation of Lead Committees-That the Parliament agrees that the Justice 1 Committee be designated as lead committee in consideration of the following regulations- the Civil Legal Aid (Scotland) Regulations 2002 (SSI 2002/494); the Advice and Assistance (Scotland) Amendment Regulations 2002 (SSI 2002/495); and the Civil Legal Aid (Scotland) (Fees) Amendment Regulations 2002 (SSI 2002/496). Supported by: Euan Robson*
